meanings.definition: Up to the present time; until now.
meanings.sent1: I have not finished my homework yet.
meanings.sent3: The cat has not caught the mouse yet.
meanings.sent4: The sun has not set yet, painting the sky in hues of orange.
meanings.sent5: The cake is not ready yet, it still needs more time in the oven.

meanings.sent1: I am tired, yet I will keep working.
meanings.sent2: It is raining, yet we will go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: I know it's late, yet I will watch one more episode.
meanings.sent4: The road was rough, yet she continued to walk with determination.
meanings.sent5: The task seemed difficult, yet she completed it with ease.

meanings.sent1: I have finished my work, yet I will help you with yours.
meanings.sent2: She is busy, yet she finds time to read every day.
meanings.sent3: The store is closed, yet the lights are still on.
meanings.sent4: The storm has passed, yet the wind still whispers through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The movie ended, yet the audience stayed seated, waiting for more.
